    • backwards

      public Matrix backwards(Matrix X, Matrix dLoss_dModule) throws Exception
      A method to calculate the total derivative dLoss_dX (i.e. the total derivative through this Module). This Module internally calculates dLoss_dW and dLoss_db and increments the gradients of those Parameters by those values. dLoss_dW = X.T * dLoss_dModule (matrix mult) dLoss_db = dLoss_dModule.sum(dim=0) dLoss_dX = dLoss_dModule * W.t (matrix mult)
      Specified by:
      backwards in class Module
      Parameters:
      X - the input Matrix
      dLoss_dModule - the total derivative up to this Module.
      Returns:
      The total derivative dLoss_dX
      Throws:
      Exception

    • getParameters

      public List<Parameter> getParameters()
      An abstract method to get a List of all Parameters contained within this Module.
      Specified by:
      getParameters in class Module
      Returns:
      the List of Parameter objects contained within this Module [W, b]
